name: Trustmarque Solutions Ltd
description: Trustmarque (part of Capita plc) is a leading end-to-end technology provider for both public and private sector organisations in the UK.  We empower our customers to succeed by delivering simplified IT services.  Trustmarque has been at the heart of the rapidly evolving IT market for over 30 years, serving more than 2,000 customers including UK government and healthcare organisations, as well as high profile clients in the private sector.
